title: Smart Student Risk Prediction
description: Designed a predictive model using hybrid deep learning techniques to identify students at risk of dropping out. Achieved preliminary accuracy of 89% in detecting risk patterns through behavioral data. Addresses real-time engagement issues in virtual education.

title: Personal Finance Manager
description: Built a secure MERN stack application with JWT authentication and full CRUD operations. Enabled monthly expense tracking by category, improving budget awareness by 40%. Integrated Chart.js for interactive data visualizations.

title: FashionHub E-commerce Website
description: Built a responsive full-stack e-commerce website using the MERN stack with React + Vite for fast rendering and optimized performance. Integrated dynamic cart, wishlist, checkout flow, and order storage using MongoDB. Improved shopping experience with image previews, real-time filters, and category-wise browsing.

title: Research Paper Manager
description: Developed a web app for managing faculty research data using the MERN stack. Reduced manual tracking time by 70% by automating publication storage and retrieval. Designed an intuitive UI to streamline document workflows.

title: Crop Recommendation System
description: Built predictive models for data analysis and Conducted data cleaning, preprocessing and visualization to enhance insights.

title: My Portfolio Website
description: A responsive and modern portfolio website built using React and Vite to showcase my skills, projects, education, and achievements. Designed with a clean UI and smooth navigation to create a professional online presence.
